title: Module help page
description: Additional plugin module for managing modules installed on web project

line1.description: Prints available and installed modules in project

line2.option --crud: Creates new CRUD main model in module

line3.option --templates: Define templates folder ex.: --templates=security creates security folder in Module/resources/views/{}
line3.description: Creates new splitter AdminSecurityController for module Admin in /App/Modules/AdminModule/Splitter/AuthAdminController.php

line4.option --crud: Creates new CRUD main model in module (must be with --addmodel option)
line4.description: Creates new model named AdminSecurity for module Admin in /App/Modules/AdminModule/Module/Authmanager.php
